summary: An expanding series of NPC aesthetic improvement mods that incorporate (what I feel) are the best hair, eye, and brow mods available on Nexus and elsewhere.
descriptionHtml:
First there was Supermodel Skyrim, NPC Overhaul, and People of Skyrim, and they were good... but with the passage of time, they've become dated.  New hair, eye, and eyebrow resources have been published, and ECE and RaceMenu make fine morphing of faces possible.
Then there was Babes of Skyrim, and that was a good idea, but I wasn't very keen on the aesthetics of those mods (and I kinda' disliked the author's edits of certain NPC inventories).
So, I did what any dedicated player should do... I started learning how to make my own versions, and for your benefit I'm publishing them here on Nexus.
(The information on this page is subject to change as I publish more in this series.)

[font=Verdana][color=#ff0000][size=5][b][i]   !!! IMPORTANT INFORMATION !!![/i][/b][/size][/color][/font]
These are not standalone mods - they are dependent on a number of other mods for their resources.  If you attempt to use these mods without their dependent Master mods installed, you may experience CTD, severe graphic abnormalities, and other headaches.
For these mods to work properly, you will need to download and install the following list of mods.

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Apachii SkyHairs[/b][/size][/color]                      by Apachii
- v1.6 Full - Download from Nexus at      [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/[/url]
You'll also need [color=#ffff00]Apachii Hair Males[/color] v1.2 and [color=#ffff00]Apachii Hair Females[/color] v1.5, available from the same download page.

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]Azar Ponytail Hairstyles[/b][/size][/color]      by Azarkiowa
- v3.0 - Download from Nexus at            [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31797/[/url]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]The Eyes of Beauty[/b][/size][/color]                by LogRaam
- v10.0.1 - Download from Nexus at       [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/[/url]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]True Eyes[/b][/size][/color]                                    by JimtownIrish
- v1.06 - Sadly, JimtownIrish has withdrawn his mods from Nexus.  I'm not sure if he has his own website to distribute them, for now.
It's possible to find them elsewhere on the www, but I don't encourage downloading from any source that the original author hasn't approved.
Future releases will include versions without this mod, and alternates that require True Eyes (for those-of-us who downloaded it prior to his departure from Nexus).

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]True Brows[/b][/size][/color]                                 by JimtownIrish
- v1.7 - Sadly, JimtownIrish has withdrawn his mods from Nexus.  The same conditions^ for this mod as for True Eyes.

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]SGEyebrows[/b][/size][/color]                               by Hello Santa
- v1.0 - Download from Nexus at            [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/[/url]

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]SG Hairpack 268[/b][/size][/color]                      by Hello Santa
Not available for download from Nexus (sorry).  Google it to find a download link.

[color=#ffff00][size=4][b]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/b][/size][/color]            by Kalilies, Shocky, and Stealthic Khaos
IMPORTANT - You need to use *this* version, and not "KS Hairdos - Final" (available elsewhere on the web).  My overhauls make use of several hairstyles that are *only* available in this version; failing to use this version will give a few NPC's severe gray-face bug issues.
- v1.4 - Download from Nexus at            [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?[/url]

     ---------------
[b][u][color=#ff7700]General Specs for All Files in this Series[/color][/u][/b]

THESE MODS ARE DESIGNED FOR USE WITH UNP(B)-TYPE BODY REPLACERS (and they should work with Vanilla as-well).
Graphic abnormalities (neck-seam issues) may occur if they are used with CBBE or other body-replacers.

TintMasks have been optimized 1024x1024 DTX1 to minimize impact on performance.

Additional requirements for each mod in this series are listed in their description, and in the ReadMe that accompanies each.
     ---------------

First offering...
[color=#ff7700][size=5][b][u]Skystone Castle Cosmetic Overhaul[/u][/b][/size][/color]
Based from the great Skystone Castle by SkyrimLazz, and published with his permissions given.
Check out the screenshots to see what changes it makes. :)
In addition to the list of cosmetic mods given above, this mod also required Dawnguard, Hearthfires, and Dragonborn (all the DLCs), and you MUST download and install the original "with NPCs" version of Skystone Castle from Lazz' page for the .bsa archive it contains.
The download package I provide is an edited .esp file which overwrites Lazz' original, and a number of FaceGenData and FaceTint loose files.
Note: This file was produced on "KS Hairdos - Final"   I've checked it against "KS Hairdos - Renewal" (the version available on Nexus) and there are no incompatibilities - I didn't use any of the hairs that had permissions revoked.
Download from Nexus at                    [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54703/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54703/[/url]

[color=#bf9000]Watch[/color] [color=#bf9000]this[/color] [color=#bf9000]space[/color] [color=#bf9000]for[/color] [color=#bf9000]further[/color] [color=#bf9000]developments![/color]
Coming soon... Cosmetic Overhauls that will all work together for...
Skyrim (basic)
Dawnguard/Hearthfires/Dragonborn (all DLC's)
Enhanced Towns & Cities
Interesting NPCs
Inconsequential NPCs - This to be published next - Job and crummy internet access has hindered this.
Helgen Reborn
and maybe more...

CREDITS & THANKS
-----------------------

Many thanks to modders whose work forms the basis (and dependent masters) of this series of mods.

In no particular order...
Apachii
Azarkiowa
Hello Santa
Kalilies
Shocky
Stealthic Khaos
JimtownIrish
Lograam
BellaGail (some 'Better Females' resources were used in generating the TintMasks)
Veeblix (some 'Stoja's Warpaints' resources were used in generating TintMasks)
(and the various Sims-&-other creators whose works have been ported into theirs with their permission)

As always, my thanks to
Bethesda
Nexus

and a tip of the hat to
Bob Newhart
author: Humanbean234
